attributes.action: To close all non essential shops and click and collect services
attributes.additional_details:
As encouraging the general public to use services that are non essential during the pandemic ie toy shops
Sofa shops
Garden centres 
Argos 
Vape shops
I think this gives a general idea
attributes.background: To close all non essential shops and click and collect services in through out the uk

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567423
